messages.text:
Hello dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.net

On Wed, Oct 10, 2012 at 1:07 PM,  <dave@cheney.net> wrote:

> LGTM. Sorry for being such a pedant.

Nope, much welcome.

On 2012/10/10 03:42:23, mikio wrote:
> Hello mailto:dave@cheney.net (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://code.google.com/p/go.net

I'm not sure having a variable the same name as the function is a good idea.

Hello dave@cheney.net (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

On 2012/10/10 04:03:07, mikio wrote:
> Hello mailto:dave@cheney.net (cc: mailto:golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
> 
> Please take another look.

LGTM. Sorry for being such a pedant.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=af69687727e7&repo=net ***

go.net/ipv4: make variable names clear

R=dave
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6632058

subject: code review 6632058: go.net/ipv4: make variable names clear
